What are some resources available to learn more about Verus and its technology?

There are several resources available to learn more about Verus and its technology, including guides, release notes, and blog posts. Some examples include "How to Update or Install Verus GUI Enhanced Agama Wallet", "Verus Coin v0.4.0 Official Release Notes", "How Verus Solved Nothing at Stake and Weak Subjectivity for Proof of Work", and "Ben’s Pocket Guide to VerusCoin for Dummies and Smart People".
